Joining Network

Cardano SL being a decentralized system, we have produced it as an open network, meaning that anyone can join the network and start participating in the protocol. To provide peer discovery, were using a hardened Kademlia DHT protocol. To join the network, a node has to know at least one other node. We call this node the bootstrap node. Even though the pool of bootstrap nodes is hardcoded, you can use any other stable node for bootstrap.
